reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Stylish Gym Companion!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the BAGSMART Women Tote Bag with Zipper, and it has quickly become my go-to gym companion. This tote is not only spacious and functional but also stylish enough to take me from the gym to other daily activities seamlessly.One of the standout features is its versatility. With designated compartments for my laptop, gym essentials, and even a side pocket for my yoga mat, this tote is a game-changer. The thoughtful design allows me to keep everything organized and easily accessible. The laptop compartment is well-padded, providing extra protection during my commute to the gym or work.The zipper closure ensures that my belongings are secure, and the sturdy construction gives me confidence that this bag will withstand the wear and tear of daily use. The material is not only durable but also easy to clean, a practical feature for a gym bag.The tote's design is both modern and chic, making it a fashionable accessory even outside the gym. The neutral color options are versatile and complement my workout and casual attire effortlessly.Comfort is not compromised either – the adjustable shoulder straps make it easy to carry, and the overall size is just right for my gym needs without being overly bulky.In summary, the BAGSMART Women Tote Bag with Zipper is a fantastic investment for those seeking a stylish, functional, and durable gym companion. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile tote that seamlessly transitions from the gym to daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a large black tote bag, and it has exceeded all of my expectations! Initially, I was apprehensive that the 'large' size would be too much, but to my delight, it's the perfect size for everyday use. Although it's marketed as a "Women Tote Bag," its sleek and minimalist design lends itself to a unisex appeal, making it a versatile choice for anyone.As a nursing student gearing up for core classes, I needed a bag that could handle the load. This tote has been a game-changer. It comfortably holds two standard-sized binders, BP cuffs, a pencil case, toiletries, a planner, and still has room to spare for additional books or a change of clothes. The added convenience of two pockets for water bottles and a small external pocket for frequently accessed items like keys and ID makes it incredibly functional for busy days.In summary, this tote is a fantastic find, especially considering the price. Its capacity, style, and utility make it a 10/10 for me, and I'm already considering purchasing another one. Highly recommended for students or anyone in need of a reliable bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and waterproof
reviews.reviewText: Comfy to carry, can fit my laptop plus a ton of stuff. Love that it has a zipper. The material is also cute and waterproof. I use this for going between two offices at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and durable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a work tote to just carry my laptop, wallet, keys, makeup, books, notepads, etc.It works well for the price. It's lightweight and durable, the bag strap doesn't hurt my shoulder even when holding on to for longer periods since the bag in general even with a laptop stored inside is super lightweight. I feel like you can carry a decent amount in here and it still feel light. It also has a zipper on top which is nice for extra security.The size of the bag is a little interesting. It isn't tall. The width fits my 15in macbook perfectly but the bag looks much more rectangular since width is longer than the height, so I think it's a little bit awkwardly shaped. Kind of reminds me of a gym bag where the width is long, height short, just interestingly shaped.. I think if they made the height just a tad bit longer it wouldn't look as awkward, but that's very minor for what I use it for. There's a laptop pocket/section within the bag but it's a little flimsy. The divider has two pockets on it as well which was a nice touch to store my keys and cardholder as well as other things like makeup.It works very well for work. I would not choose to use it outside of work though because it's not as stylish as I imagined it to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had a different tote bag and wanted to size up for school. This bag is 10/10! Amazing quality and the color was perfect! I loved that the yoga mat strap was detachable, since I am using it for school! I was surprised with all the pockets! And I love the laptop pocket! I was so excited to switch my old bag over to this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel on a plane.
reviews.reviewText: This bag is da bomb! Lots of pockets! I bought it as a carry-on under a plane seat. It will fit extra shoes, a light jacket, a water bottle and numerous odds and ends. Im not a yoga or workout person, but I can use the mat strap for other things. The shoulder strap is the perfect length for me, 5' 4". Love that it's washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stylish, pretty looks well made. Love the fabric and texture, nice compartment. Item was damaged in shipping. Due to packaging style. But they sent another replacement right away and got it in time. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding!!!! Perfect Zipped Travel Bag
reviews.reviewText: BEST TRAVEL CARRY ON BAG EVER!!!It was time to retire my other travel bag of 20 years. I searched and searched for a replacement. This is it. The bag is the perfect size. Not too big and not too small. The outside material is like parachute pants. Water will bounce right off. It's sturdy and well made. It has 3 nice pockets inside. 1 zipped. There is a separation inside, which I like because I travel with a folder that carries my vouchers and tickets that some international countries that have not upgraded electronically still use. The folder fits nicely inside. I can put my purse, and other essentials on the other side of the separation. It also zips closed which protects from pickpockets on trains, airports, and ferries. Love this bag.

Vi esta bolsa en un video y me encantó pero tenía mis dudas, el paquete llegó según lo esperado, la tela es impermeable muy resistente yo lo he lavado ya 2 veces en maquina y no lenhanpasado nada , el color duradero muy resistente y los cierres de muy buena calidad. Lo compraría nuevamente

I am very pleased with this tote bag. It has many pockets on the inside. Zipper closes it securely with added option to use Velcro fastener. Best part is that it fits my 15.6” laptop. Planning to use this for school, work, & the gym. I was going to buy the lulu clean lines tote but wasn’t sure based on reviews. I’m so happy I didn’t because this tote is much less bulky & also features water bottle holders on the outside which I like better.
Really love this as a gym bag. Not spacious. A pair of shoes,gloves,small towel,500ml water bottle and it's 3/4 full. Great color
Nice bag with lot of spaceMoreover got on a discounted price

I saw a youtuber use this bag for clinical placements and I thought I'd try it out, not expecting the quality to be that good. This absolutely blew me away! It is such a beautiful bag and the quality is so much better than I could ask for. It fits an insane amount of stuff inside, from my stethoscope to massive textbooks and there is still heaps of space left. I love that it has a lot of pockets too so I can keep everything organised. Considering buying the black one too now because I think it would make such a good daily tote regardless of what you need it for. Very happy with the purchase. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
